quote: Find what you want. I will find you.
author: Lloyd Alexander,  Westmark

quote: Want less, live more
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: if you want it really, you get it !!!
author: Ravinder Singh

quote: I want my world to start and end with you.
author: E.L. James,  Fifty Shades of Grey

quote: I want you any way I can get you. Not because you’re beautiful or clever or kind or adorable, although devil knows you’re all those things. I want you because there’s no one else like you, and I don’t ever want to start a day without seeing you.
author: Lisa Kleypas,  Tempt Me at Twilight

quote: I've never wanted more, until I met you.
author: E.L. James,  Fifty Shades of Grey

quote: I want to reconcile the violence in your heart.I want to recognize your beauty's not just a mask.I want to exorcise the demons from your past.I want to satisfy the undisclosed desires in your heart.
author: Matthew Bellamy

quote: If you want me, you’d better hurry. Act now, supplies are limited.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: I want to love you without clutching, appreciate you without judging, join you without invading, invite you without demanding, leave you without guilt, criticize you without blaming, and help you without insulting. If I can have the same from you, then we can truly meet and enrich each other.
author: Virginia Satir

quote: I don’t want fame, money, or duty. I want to close my eyes and see your loving beauty.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To answer your question, you want me because I'm made of awesome.
author: Gena Showalter,  Heart of Darkness

quote: Know what you want and reach out eagerly for it.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita,  Pearls of Wisdom: Great mind

quote: Mara, that's the life I want to give you. That's what I'm offering you. I want to fill you life with color and warmth. I want to fill it with light. Give me a chance
author: Francine Rivers,  Redeeming Love

quote: I want you. I want you so badly I can’t stand it. When you left, it felt like the world got darker. Like I couldn’t truly see anything. Couldn’t feel anything.
author: Rachel Vincent,  Alpha

quote: When you can't get what you want, get what you need
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: I bought you a gift. It’s something I’ve always wanted, but I’m not quite sure you’ll like it. So if you don’t want it just tell me and I’ll be happy to keep it. After all, I’m only interested in making you happy.
author: Jarod Kintz,  At even one penny, this book would be overpriced. In fact, free is too expensive, because you'd still waste time by reading it.

quote: I want you to want me because you want me, not because of grief, not because he is not here. I want you to love me for me. I want you to kiss me first and not because you need me to help you, but because you need to kiss me.
author: Carrie Jones,  Entice

quote: I have a million things to talk to you about. All I want in this world is you. I want to see you and talk. I want the two of us to begin everything from the beginning.
author: Haruki Murakami,  Norwegian Wood

quote: I want anyone who believes in life, liberty, pursuit of happiness to succeed. And I want any force, any person, any element of an overarching Big Government that would stop your success, I want that organization, that element or that person to fail. I want you to succeed.
author: Rush Limbaugh

quote: I want him to be happy. And I want you to be happy, too. Even if you can only find that happiness without me.
author: S.J. Watson,  Before I Go to Sleep

quote: I want to be with you forever and beyond...
author: Gail Carson Levine,  Ella Enchanted

quote: I want to try with someone who loves me enough to try with me. I want to grow old looking at the same face every morning. I want to grow old looking at the same face every night at the dinner table. I want to be one of those old couples you see still holding hands and laughing after fifty years of marriage. That's what I want. I want to be someone's forever.
author: Rachel Gibson,  The Trouble With Valentine's Day

quote: What you want most you push away from you.You want more than you care to admit.
author: Tarjei Vesaas,  The Bridges

quote: All I have is all I need and all I need is all I have in this moment.
author: Byron Katie

quote: I desire the things that will destroy me in the end.
author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

quote: I don't want to be in love but you're makin' me
author: Jonny Lang

quote: I want you to have big dreams, big goals. I want you to strive to achieve them. But I don't want to see you beating yourself up every time you make a mistake.
author: Kelley Armstrong,  The Gathering

quote: To dream your wildest dream, find your deepest desire.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I want your most vital organ. I want it to be mine.
author: Coco J. Ginger

quote: Oh, Life, I am yours. Whatever it is you want of me, I am ready to give.
author: William Steig,  Dominic

quote: I'll always want him. Until every sun goes dark in every sky, until I am nothing more than long-forgotten cosmic dust, I will want him. And even then I suspect my particles will long for his.
author: Ann Aguirre,  Doubleblind

quote: I want to see you.Know your voice.Recognize you when youfirst come 'round the corner.Sense your scent when I come into a room you've just left.Know the lift of your heel,the glide of your foot.Become familiar with the way you purse your lipsthen let them part, just the slightest bit,when I lean in to your spaceand kiss you.I want to know the joy of how you whisper "more
author: Rumi

quote: What I want is to be needed. What I need is to be indispensable to somebody. Who I need is somebody that will eat up all my free time, my ego, my attention. Somebody addicted to me. A mutual addiction.
author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Choke

quote: Whoever you are, or whatever it is that you do, when you really want something, it's because that desire originated in the soul of the universe. It's your mission on earth.
author: Paulo Coelho,  The Alchemist

quote: I want everything with you, America. I want the holidays and the birthdays, the busy season and lazy weekends. I want peanut butter fingertips on my desk. I want inside jokes and fights and everything. I want a life with you.
author: Kiera Cass,  The One

quote: I want morning and noon and nightfall with you. I want your tears, your smiles, your kisses...the smell of your hair, the taste of your skin, the touch of your breath on my face. I want to see you in the final hour of my life...to lie in your arms as I take my last breath.
author: Lisa Kleypas,  Again the Magic

quote: What you seek is seeking you.
author: Rumi

quote: I want him to burn for me, to not be able to go a day without touching me, holding me, caressing me. He’ll be an excellent lover. I want a man who knows how to please me,
author: Maya Banks,  The Tycoon's Rebel Bride

quote: I want to rekindle the inner fire that is burning in you. I want it to come out to take away the darkness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I just want your voice aimed at me again. I want to absorb the direction of your eyes…
author: Jennifer Elisabeth

quote: Don’t give people what they want, give them what they need.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: If you want me again look for me under your boot soles.
author: Walt Whitman,  Leaves of Grass

quote: I want to think again of dangerous and noble things. I want to be light and frolicsome. I want to be improbable beautiful and afraid of nothing, as though I had wings.
author: Mary Oliver,  Owls and Other Fantasies: Poems and Essays

quote: If you are a dreamer come in
author: Shel Silverstein

quote: I wanted the whole world or nothing.
author: Charles Bukowski,  Post Office

quote: I am seeking, I am striving, I am in it with all my heart.
author: Vincent van Gogh

quote: If everyone wants to be somebody, I want to be somebody else
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: I do want more. I am not content with being happy. I was not made for it. It is not my destiny. My destiny is the opposite.
author: Hermann Hesse,  Steppenwolf

quote: You can have anything you want if you want it badly enough. You can be anything you want to be, do anything you set out to accomplish if you hold to that desire with singleness of purpose.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: My heart only ever had one thought, one want. One need. Despite all, in spite of all...All my heart has ever wanted is you.
author: Stephanie Laurens,  The Edge of Desire
